sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Upgrade existing Slack team to Slack enterprise.</description> <name>Slack Enterprise Upgrade</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[new sn_cs_adapter.SlackEnterpriseUpgrader().upgrade();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-09-24 21:44:37</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2439a6f00b3023000e83c71437673a3c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Slack Enterprise Upgrade</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Glide Conversation Server Adapters" source="com.glide.cs.adapter">46077ecb2f400110d8a4d5f62799b62c</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_2439a6f00b3023000e83c71437673a3c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-09-24 21:44:37</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>true</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
